name: Gensokyo of the Dead
description:
Many zombies have appeared throughout Gensokyo for some strange reason! Play as the half-phantom sword fighter Konpaku Youmu as she tries to survive an incoming horde of zombies as she waits for a friend to let her into her house!

Controls:

[A] or [Left] to go left.

[D] or [Right] to go right.

[W] or [Up] to go up.

[S] or [Down] to go down.

[Z] or [LMB] to do a light attack.

[X] or [RMB] to do a heavy attack.

Possible combo moves with different effects include:
Light
Heavy
Light > Light
Light > Heavy
Light > Light > Heavy

Try them out!
